text: Anumula Revanth Reddy, commonly known as Revanth Reddy, (born 8 November 1969) is an Indian politician serving as the second and current Chief Minister of Telangana since 7 December 2023. He represents Kodangal assembly constituency in the Telangana Legislative assembly. He belongs to the Indian National Congress party. ==References== Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Telangana Category:Politicians from Andhra Pradesh Category:Indian National Congress politicians Category:People from Mahbubnagar district Category:Telugu Desam Party politicians Category:Members of the Andhra Pradesh Legislative Council Category:Andhra Pradesh MLAs 2009–2014 Category:Telangana MLAs 2014–2018 Category:Indian prisoners and detainees Category:Crime in Telangana Category:India MPs 2019–present Category:Indian National Congress politicians from Telangana Category:Chief Ministers of Telangana Category:Chief ministers from Indian National Congress
title: Revanth Reddy
